Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string and two cups to show the string telephone device.
The student can include two students communicating using the string telephone.
The student can illustrate that the string is pulled tight to allow communication.
The student can show sound traveling through the string by including lines or arrows.
The student can depict how the device sends and receives information over a distance.
The student can demonstrate that only the materials provided (cups and string) are used in the design.
